definition: a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation
step by step/one step at a time

sentences.english: Methods and steps of reading assembly drawings.
sentences.chinese: 看装配图的方法和步骤。

sentences.english: Here are the three steps of drawing a sketch map of Siu Sai Wan.
sentences.chinese: 以下是绘画小西湾略图的三个步骤。

sentences.english: The finite element analysis (FEA) and the variable density methods were used. The optimization method and process were presented.
sentences.chinese: 采用有限元法与变密度法，给出了优化方法和步骤。

sentences.english: All other event types, like changes or intermediary steps, are processed differently.
sentences.chinese: 所有其他事件类型，如变化或中间步骤，被区别对待。

sentences.english: And it narrates main design approaches and the confirmation to parameter.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了主要的设计步骤和参数的确定。

sentences.english: Follow these steps to map subunits to existing models and packages.
sentences.chinese: 按照以下的步骤来将子单元映射为已存在的模型和包。

sentences.english: Repeat this process, to keep your inboxes empty .
sentences.chinese: 重复这些步骤，保持你的收件箱为空。

sentences.english: Anything that comes after the steps goes into another section-like element.
sentences.chinese: 步骤之后的内容放到其他类似节的元素中。

sentences.english: Here are five steps you can take to help your machines run much faster.
sentences.chinese: 以下是能让你的机器健步如飞起来的五个步骤。

sentences.english: Vectorization is a crucial step in the automatic punching.
sentences.chinese: 矢量化是图像自动编针中很重要的步骤。

sentences.english: The following sub-sections will address the final three of the above steps.
sentences.chinese: 以下几小节内容将介绍上述后三个步骤。

sentences.english: Learn about the basic steps of the Merengue in this free video dance lesson.
sentences.chinese: 有关这梅伦格学习的基本步骤在此免费视频舞蹈课。

sentences.english: They should be able to document every step from scratch.
sentences.chinese: 他们也应该能够从零开始记录每一个步骤。

sentences.english: The customer might not follow the prescribed steps exactly when required.
sentences.chinese: 客户可能不会在需要时完全按照规定的步骤进行。

sentences.english: From my experience, I'd like to talk about the importance and steps of review.
sentences.chinese: 我愿意从我的经验谈复习的重要性和步骤方法。

sentences.english: The quickest and simplest way to wreck any relationship is to listen to gossip.
sentences.chinese: 关联的最快最浅易的步骤就是听信谣言。

definition: course/stream/sequence of processes/work flow in manufacturing
a trick/an ingenious method/know-how/the knack (of doing sth)
way of handling sth/method for making/work method/recipe/practice/CL:個|个[ge4]
course of study/teaching module at university/tutorial
(zoology) segment (of the body of a worm, centipede etc)/(fig.) a part of an integrated whole: aspect (of a project), element (of a policy), sector (of the economy), stage (of a process), etc
